personalInfo.name: Binal Shah
personalInfo.title: AI Data Engineer | Digital Innovation Specialist
personalInfo.summary: AI Data Engineer with proven expertise in spec-driven development, agentic systems, and production RAG pipelines. Pioneered innovative AI-powered solutions that positioned AusBiz Consulting as a digital HR technology innovator. Combines deep technical proficiency in Next.js 15/React 19, vector databases, and AI agent development with exceptional leadership skills demonstrated through training 6+ team members and coordinating 200+ person events. Expert in human-centered AI design with 2+ years customer experience excellence.
personalInfo.elevator_pitch: I'm an AI Data Engineer who transforms static data into intelligent, interactive systems. At AusBiz Consulting, I developed an AI-powered Digital Twin platform that revolutionizes how recruiters engage with candidate profiles, using cutting-edge RAG pipelines and spec-driven development with Claude Sonnet 4.0. I combine deep technical expertise with proven leadership skills, having trained teams and coordinated 200+ person events while maintaining a focus on human-centered AI solutions.
personalInfo.career_objective: AI Data Engineer/Architect specializing in intelligent digital solutions and production-scale AI systems
personalInfo.visa_status: Australian student visa (part-time during study, full-time post-graduation)
personalInfo.availability: Available for rotating rosters, including evening shifts

experience.description: Developed an AI-powered Digital Twin platform that transformed static resumes into interactive, intelligent systems for recruiters using spec-driven development methodology with advanced AI tools.
achievements: Delivered a working digital twin prototype that positioned AusBiz Consulting as an innovator in digital HR technology
Successfully integrated multiple cutting-edge AI technologies into a cohesive, production-ready platform
Implemented dual-vector database architecture with ChromaDB and Upstash for optimized performance
Created first-of-its-kind interactive resume technology using vector embeddings and JSON data chunking
Established automated testing framework with continuous refinement workflows

detailed_responsibilities: Designed AI-assisted specifications including requirements gathering, technical documentation, and architecture roadmaps
Built and deployed Next.js 15 + React 19 application integrated with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and Vercel's AI SDK
Implemented retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines using ChromaDB and Upstash vector databases
Applied continuous refinement workflows with automated testing and Claude Sonnet 4.0 in agent mode
Used workshop prompts and weekly one-on-one meetings with AusBiz team for guidance and iteration

projects.name: Smart Attendance System - Computer Vision Capstone
projects.description: Comprehensive role-based attendance management system using facial recognition technology. Features three-tier access control (Admin/Teacher/Student) with automated attendance tracking and reporting capabilities.
outcomes: Developed complete role-based attendance management system
Implemented secure facial recognition with local processing
Created comprehensive admin dashboard with full system access
Built teacher portal with subject-specific attendance management
Designed student interface with personal attendance tracking and timetables
challenges: Implementing accurate facial recognition with local processing constraints
Designing secure role-based access control system
Creating efficient database schema for attendance tracking and reporting
Integrating computer vision with web application architecture

technical_details.backend: Python Flask web server with SQLite database
technical_details.security: Werkzeug password hashing and Flask-CORS integration
technical_details.face_recognition: Local processing using face_recognition library with NumPy and Pillow
technical_details.database: SQLite with Flask-SQLAlchemy ORM (configurable for other SQL databases)
technical_details.file_management: Static files and images stored in organized folder structure

features.admin_portal: Full system access, user management, comprehensive attendance analytics
features.teacher_portal: Subject-specific attendance management, class viewing, downloadable reports
features.student_portal: Personal attendance tracking, subject enrollment, teacher information, integrated timetable
features.facial_recognition: Automated attendance recording with face encoding and matching
features.reporting: Downloadable attendance reports and analytics dashboards

content_chunks.title: Digital Twin Technical Implementation
content_chunks.content: Developed AI-powered Digital Twin platform using spec-driven development with GitHub Copilot and Claude Sonnet 4.0 agent mode via VS Code. Implemented dual-vector database architecture with ChromaDB and Upstash, using vector embeddings and JSON data chunking for resume transformation. Built using Next.js 15 + React 19 with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and Vercel AI SDK. Created automated testing framework with food RAG query system for database validation. Positioned AusBiz Consulting as digital HR technology innovator.

content_chunks.title: Training and Team Leadership Excellence
content_chunks.content: Trained and mentored 6+ new hires at Zeus Street Greek, reducing onboarding time by 40% through systematic curriculum development. Used Deputy digital task management system for workflow optimization. Coordinated 13-member volunteer teams across Sydney and Melbourne for Students for Liberty, managing events for 200+ participants. Achieved 85% engagement success rate through regular programs, meetups, and Google Meet sessions. Recognized by leadership for consistently high performance and teamwork.

content_chunks.title: Smart Attendance System - Independent Full-Stack Development
content_chunks.content: Single-handedly developed comprehensive role-based attendance management system as independent capstone project using Python Flask, SQLite, and face_recognition library. Independently implemented three-tier access control (Admin/Teacher/Student) with differentiated permissions. Self-implemented Werkzeug for password hashing, Flask-CORS for security, and Flask-SQLAlchemy ORM for database management. Solo development of automated facial recognition attendance recording, downloadable reports, and integrated timetable system. Completed all local image processing with NumPy and Pillow for computer vision pipeline without external assistance.

content_chunks.title: AI-Powered Development Methodology
content_chunks.content: Pioneered spec-driven development using GitHub Copilot for code generation, Claude Sonnet 4.0 agent mode for strategic guidance, and v0 for frontend design. Developed multi-AI tool conflict resolution strategies through prompt optimization and tool switching. Implemented continuous refinement workflows with automated testing frameworks. Used workshop techniques and trial-and-error with v0 for prompt engineering. Applied MCP protocol for advanced AI integration.

content_chunks.title: Customer Service and Operational Excellence
content_chunks.content: Delivered outstanding customer service to 20+ customers per week in high-volume environments at Zeus Street Greek. Handled escalations with professionalism while maintaining customer satisfaction and team KPIs. Managed closing procedures and digital workflow coordination. Recognized by leadership for consistently high customer satisfaction and exceptional teamwork. Applied human-centered approach to technical solutions.

content_chunks.title: Large-Scale Event Management and Coordination
content_chunks.content: Coordinated workshops for 200+ students across multiple universities as Local Coordinator for Students for Liberty Australia. Managed hybrid technology infrastructure with Microsoft Teams and Zoom integration. Coordinated budget approval processes through project management teams. Maintained engagement across 13 volunteer teams through regular programs and virtual meetings. Achieved 85% success rate measured through participation metrics and program onboarding conversions.

career_trajectory.current_stage: AI Data Engineering Intern transitioning to full-time role
